placeholder.blindLevelMin: maximum position if sun calced position
placeholder.blindLevelMax: minimum position if sun calced position
placeholder.OverwriteExpire: (opt) the duration a manual setting will remain is place
placeholder.sunFloorLength: (opt) the extent to which direct sunlight is to be allowed into the room through the window, defined as a length on the floor
placeholder.sunMinAltitude: (opt) minimum altitude of the sun for determination of blind position
placeholder.cloudValue: percentage of sky occluded by clouds
placeholder.cloudBlindPos: blind position when cloud-value is below threshold
placeholder.smoothTime: (opt) prevents changes due to sun in the given time
placeholder.name: Name

text.time:
Time control:Only rows will be evaluated, where property is not used or matches the selected value.
until:The first matching line will used, where defined time is not used or greater than now.
from:The last matching line will used, where defined time is not used or less than now.
text.blindLevelDefault: if no definition matches the following position will be used
text.overwrite: manual overwrite of the blind position
text.sunControlActive: Restricting the extent to which direct sunlight may shine into the room
text.windowAzimuth: representing the orientation of the window to geographical north (in degrees) when the sun falls into the window (sun azimuth).
text.windowPos: window settings, measurement from the floor to bottom and top of the window covered by the blind

reasons.default: position is set to default position because no other rule matches
reasons.smooth: Position is not changed to __pos__ because not enough time has passed since the last change (time smooth)

errors.invalid-blind-level: Given Blind-Position __pos__ is not a valid Position!
errors.getPropertyData: error getting property data: "__message__" skipping time
errors.smoothTimeToolong: The selected smooth is too long!!
